body_html: I'd recommend using the google/seq2seq github repo. It's a very good, complete and maintained seq2seq implementation. Beam search is here: https://github.com/google/seq2seq/blob/master/seq2seq/inference/beam_search.py
body_text: I'd recommend using the google/seq2seq github repo. It's a very good, complete and maintained seq2seq implementation. Beam search is here: https://github.com/google/seq2seq/blob/master/seq2seq/inference/beam_search.py
